item.title: Using ReactJS & TensorflowJS for Text Classification
item.description: Live Demo: Indian Name Classification Source Code: Github Python Code: Notebook Intro to Text Classification Often times human use logic and knowledge to analyze different things. For Example, A botanist could identify and name different species of plants than a normal person. While the normal person could use logic to say how plants differ based on their shape, size and color of the leaves. This problem of identifying the class/category of any object is known as Classification.

item.title: How to create binary search tree in Python3?
item.description: What are Binary Search Trees? This will by my first topic on which I will be showing you guys on how to implement a binary search tree datastructre(DS) and go through the basic fundamentals. So a Binary Search Tree (BST) is a type of graph data structrue where you have many nodes arranged in a reversed tree fashion. Each node starting from the top (which is called as root node) is split into two sub trees.
